}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WX-5565D (WX5565_V02)
[[Dell TrueMobile 2300 v1 (WX-5565D)/vA00|A00]], [[Dell TrueMobile 2300 v1 (WX-5565D)/vA01|A01]], [[Dell TrueMobile 2300 v1 (WX-5565D)/v1.0|v01]]
The device is on the [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices '''DD-WRT''' supported device table]. *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:dell:truemobile2300 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :Switch is part no. BCM5325MA2KQM. The Mini PCI card is soldered onto the retaining clips..
JTAG [[TechInfoDepot:JTAG/JTAG Pinouts#Dell_Truemobile_2300_v1|adding possible]]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|vintreq}} Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24 build VINTAGE
Please insert instructions here
===OpenWrt=== ====Recovery==== This information is per [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=5656 ''tasiak'' on the '''OpenWrt''' forums].
The 2300 v1 is recoverable from (at least some) bricked states via pin shorting.. :specifically, pins 9 and 10 on the Flash IC. Pin 1 is denoted by the silkscreened dot. Pin 10 should be about where a small :silkscreened line on the PCB which intersects with ''R69'' in the board photos below.
'''Recovery steps...''' *'''0:''' Figure out how you are going to proceed with the following steps. *'''1:''' Power the router off. *'''2:''' Power the router on. Wait for LED init.. *'''3:''' Short pins 9 and 10 for a short period of time (~ 1 second). *'''4:''' Press the reset button. <small>([[User:M86|I]] did not find this step necessary.)</small> *'''5:''' The router should now be pingable at whatever the bootloader is set to.. probably 192.168.2.1. *'''6:''' TFTP <small>('''binary''' / '''octet''' mode)</small> the firmware of choice :<small>([[User:M86|I]] used the latest version of '''Tomato''', the stock FW did not work)</small> to the unit and wait.
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="poor quality scans" mode="slideshow"> File:Dell_2300_(WX5565)_top_shield_removed_mini_pci_desoldered.jpg|shot of the top of the main board File:Dell_2300_(WX5565)_bot.jpg|shot of the bottom of the main board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==Notes== ===Used PSU(s)=== The included power adapter is a '''Delta''' ADP-10SB REV. B. :ID/OD/length measurements used in this entry are likely not exact..
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Delta Electronics |model = ADP-10SB |revision = B |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.4 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |countrymanuf = China }}
